SAINT.Name: On this day, we sing the service for the Finding of the Head of the Forerunner
Venerable Basil the Confessor, companion of the Venerable Procopius at Decapolis (+ c. 750)
Hieromartyr Proterius the Patriarch of Alexandria (+ 457)
Hieromartyr Nestor, Bishop of Magydos in Pamphylia (+250)
Venerable women: Marina, Kyra, and Dominica of Syria (+ c. 450)
Apostles of the 70: Nymphus and Ebbulus
Blessed Nicholas Salos of Pskov the Fool-For-Christ (+1576)
